messages.subject: New File Notification message
messages.msgSnippet: Please disregard this.  I don t know why it sent it... I didn t request it to notify the group. MissBehavin brought up something on SHQ that I wish someone
messages.messageBody:
Please disregard this. I don't know why it sent it... I didn't request it to notify the group.

MissBehavin' brought up something on SHQ that I wish someone had told me was a possibility for keeping stories archived... saving them as htm files to the Files Section.

I'm uploading two of my stories that have appeared elsewhere. One is the one-shot Eiyu, the other being the full text of the completed Fast Carriage on a Runaway Road. If it still insists on bothering you with a notification, I'm sorry. If this works (which it appears it will and help get stories transfered to the SHQ website quicker), then I'm freeing up the LJ for general consumption starting tonight.

phil

Yahoo! Groups Notification <notify@yahoogroups.com> wrote:

Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of your SHQ_Spy_Division
group.

File : /Archive of Stories/Eiyu.htm
Uploaded by : spiritus_saitou
Description : Eiyu (RK, SaitouxSano, PG)

You can access the file at the URL

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SHQ_Spy_Division/files/Archive%20of%20Stories/Eiyu.htm

Your group is currently configured to send you email
notification whenever a member uploads a file. To turn off
notification, visit

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SHQ_Spy_Division/join

Thank you for choosing Yahoo! Groups as your email group
service for the SHQ_Spy_Division group.

Regards,

Yahoo! Groups Customer Care

Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/





Do you Yahoo!?
Yahoo! Finance Tax Center - File online. File on time.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
